```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F)
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
```

```{r}
tab <- tibble("Week" = paste('Week', 1:6)) %>% 
  mutate('HTML' = '', PDF='')
tab[1,2] <- '[HTML](lectures/week1/00_intro.html)'
tab[1,3] <- '[PDF](lectures/week1/00_intro.pdf)'
tab %>% 
  gt() %>% 
  fmt_markdown(columns = TRUE)
```
